heading: Rimescar Caverns Dungeon Guide
content: Rimescar Caverns is a dungeon unlocked by completing the Codex of Power is not good, and the dungeon layout is mediocre. Still, the Renown reward and Side Quest makes this dungeon worth doing at least once for completion. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! This dungeon is not accessible until you cleanse out the evil in the . This unlocks the Dungeon along with potential vendors. This can be done solo, but goes by quicker with a group of friends. Reviewed by
